ingredients.item: 1½ tsp finely chopped fresh root ginger
350g cooked basmati rice, grains fluffed and separated
2 small lemons, juice and 2 tsp zest
1 tbsp fresh coriander leaves, roughly chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large, heavy-based pan over a medium heat. Add the mustard seeds, let them splutter for 5 seconds, then add the chilli for 2-3 seconds.

Turn the heat to low and add the turmeric and ginger. Fry for 5 seconds, then add the cooked rice. Stir well for a minute, making sure the rice absorbs all the flavours. Stir in the lemon juice and zest, then turn off the heat. While the rice is still warm, add the curry leaves and season to taste. Garnish with the coriander just before serving.
